title: Salesman's Sample Book, early 20th century
inscribed: Stamped on cover: "Ed. Oberliethner's Son's, Mähr. Schönberg"
dimensions: H x W (closed): 51 x 34 cm (20 1/16 x 13 3/8 in.)
description: Bound volume containing sixty-seven monochrome square damask napkins, each with a selvage-to-selvage width. Each stamped with a number, and most are stamped with a title.

tombstone.epitaph: Salesman's Sample Book, early 20th century. Medium: linen, leather, paper. 1983-49-1.
